Text: DynastyMichael Thank you for your prompt response today Would it be possible for Enron to issue a letter to Dynasty stating that they have an interest either purchasing Dynastys ZEV credits andor purchasing a right to future Dynasty credits call provision subject to Dynasty securing its financing If it were possible for Enron to issue this type of letter it would be helpful in Dynastys financing as it shows a potential sale for Dynastys ZEV credit other than the ZEVXchange group Kelly Kennedy

RE DynastyMichael To try and conclude our financing I ask that you provide a response as quickly as possible Kelly Original Message From Taylor Michael E mailtoMichaelE NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Kelly Kennedy Subject RE Dynasty Kelly I received your fax today I was out of the office on Friday Sincerely Michael Taylor Coal and Emissions Trading Enron Global Markets This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE DynastyMichael I received counter offer and although it represents a offer for ZEV credits I believe that the value of per credit will have a negative impact on our financing as opposed to a hoped for positive impact Can Enron increase their offer per credit Kelly Original Message From Taylor Michael E mailtoMichaelE NRONcom Sent Tuesday October AM To Kelly Kennedy Subject RE Dynasty Kelly I have sent you a fax with a counteroffer Michael Original Message From Kelly Kennedy mailto Sent Monday October AM To Taylor Michael E Subject RE Dynasty Michael To try and conclude our financing I ask that you provide a response as quickly as possible Kelly Original Message From Taylor Michael E mailtoMichaelE NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Kelly Kennedy Subject RE Dynasty Kelly I received your fax today I was out of the office on Friday Sincerely Michael Taylor Coal and Emissions Trading Enron Global Markets This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Dynasty Motorcar Cc Michael and Trevor Attached to this email is copy of a public prospectus document from a financing earlier this year as well as analyst reports Currently the Company has Million shares outstanding The Company trades on the Canadian Ventures Exchange however at the Companys request our stock has been suspended from trading until a financing can be concluded The Company has outstanding obligations of Million in trade payables and in shareholder loans The Company has received the following funding Million in May from a reverse takeover of Atwood Gold Million in June from a private placement of common shares Funds came from insiders employeesfriends family and associates Million in Jan from a convertible debenture Funds from insiders employees friends and associates Million March from a bridge loan with a group out of Hong Kong In March a public offering was completed with gross proceeds of Million and net proceeds after commissions legal and other associated costs of Million The Convertible debenture funds and the bridge loans were rolled into this offering thereby eliminating any debt in the Company at that time With the roll in of the debt financing of Million the March financing netted the Company Million in additional capital Currently the Company is seeking to secure a short term financing of Million Canadian funds and is also working on a larger financing of Million to Million The Million financing is linked to funds needed to restart operations and to provide vehicles to ZevXchange LLC for sale in California These funds would be used for immediate production restart and the funds would allow the Company time to complete a larger financing The larger financing is required to provide adequate working capital for production ramp up marketing and dealer development and for continuation of RD programs If Enron were to participate in a financing then Dynasty could not move forward with ZevXchange LLC This would reduce sales volumes as the majority were scheduled for ZevXchange This reduction in sales volumes would require Dynasty to secure more than million so as Dynasty could immediately begin dealer signings in California and launch sales campaigns targeted at fleet buyers Fleet buyers would include cities state universities rentals developers airports and military installations which would require some discounting of selling prices It is anticipated that without the ZevXchange LLC initial guaranteed orders that Dynasty would need to increase its initial financing to Million Dynastys cash requirements could be met through various means and combinations including a private placement of equity convertible debenture loan andor prepayment of ZEV credits If you have any questions please contact me I can be reached on my cell phone at Brad Imrich will be forwarding the three year forecast and Howard Wilson will forward our California plan without ZevXchange LLC sales Kelly Kennedy
